issues.description: The return type of getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor is specified as int in the problem statement UML but the template stub’s hint and the solution implementation use double. This mismatch creates confusion about which type students should implement and may cause test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the UML in the problem statement to use a double return type for getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor (i.e., change +getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor(): int to +getNumberOfStudentsPerTutor(): double) so it matches the template hint and solution implementation.
